SettingsItem.Name: Use kinetic conversion factors subgroup
SettingsItem.Description: Kinetic conversion factors are dependent on subgroups (e.g. based on age or gender, see dataformats KineticConversionfactorsSGs).

SettingsItem.Name: Target biological matrix
SettingsItem.Description: The internal target/matrices for which kinetic conversion factors are to be computed.

SettingsItem.Name: Resample kinetic conversion factors
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies whether kinetic conversion factors are resampled.

SettingsItem.Name: PBK model simulations
SettingsItem.Description: Number of PBK model simulations used to derive kinetic conversion factors from PBK model simulations.

SettingsItem.Name: Exposure range minimum
SettingsItem.Description: Minimum of the external exposure range for PBK model simulations used to derive kinetic conversion factors from PBK model simulations.

SettingsItem.Name: Exposure range maximum
SettingsItem.Description: Maximum of the external exposure range for PBK model simulations used to derive kinetic conversion factors from PBK model simulations.

SettingsItem.Name: Compute between internal target conversion factors
SettingsItem.Description: Compute kinetic conversion factors to extrapolate exposures/concentrations between internal targets/matrices.
